title: Cut of the Cross
description: When the Governor’s niece turns up dead on the shores of Spanish St. Augustine – brutalized in horrific fashion – the entire colony is frantic to find the killer. In this second murder mystery in the Colonial City Series, Robert L. Gold takes you inside Florida’s “First City” as it was in the 1780s. Follow the deceptive trail through the sandy streets, past the Castillo de San Marco, and into dense woodlands as handsome young Lieutenant Dorado Delgado hunts down a killer seemingly too cunning to capture.
author: Robert L. Gold
